jpo
Class ThumbnailCreationQueue

java.lang.Object
  jpo.ThumbnailCreationQueue
public class ThumbnailCreationQueue
extends java.lang.Object

Queue that holds requests to create Thumbnails from Highres Images

Constant Field Values

COMPARISON_PRIORITY

protected static final int COMPARISON_PRIORITY
a constant to used in the process of finding the highest priority queue item. It must be 1 more than the Low Priority.

Constructor Detail

ThumbnailCreationQueue

public ThumbnailCreationQueue()
Method Detail

requestThumbnailCreation

public static void requestThumbnailCreation(Thumbnail thumb,
                                            int priority)
This method puts a ThumbnailCreationRequest on the queue. If a suitable cached image exists it will be used instead.

Parameters:
thumb - The Thumbnail which is to be loaded
priority - The priority with which the rquest is to be treated on the queue

forceThumbnailCreation

public static void forceThumbnailCreation(Thumbnail thumb,
                                          int priority)
This method puts a ThumbnailCreationRequest on the queue. The thumbnail will be rebuilt from the source image.

Parameters:
thumb - The Thumbnail which is to be loaded
priority - The priority with which the rquest is to be treated on the queue

requestThumbnailCreation

public static void requestThumbnailCreation(Thumbnail thumb,
                                            int priority,
                                            boolean force)
This method puts a ThumbnailCreationRequest on the queue.

Parameters:
thumb - The Thumbnail which is to be loaded
priority - The priority with which the rquest is to be treated on the queue
force - Set to true if the thumbnail needs to be rebuilt from source, false if using a cached version is ok.

remove

public static void remove(Thumbnail thumb)
removes the specified Thumbnail from the queue.

Parameters:
thumb - The thumbnail to be removed

removeAll

public static void removeAll()
removes all queue requests from the queue.

getRequest

public static ThumbnailQueueRequest getRequest()
this method returns the highest priority request on the queue. If there are no elements it returns null.
